titles.title: VISITOR Act
Visa Improvement, Streamlined Investment, and Tourism Optimization Reform Act
VISITOR Act
To authorize amounts collected in certain visa fees to be made available to reduce visa wait times, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, and Appropriations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
